languages.text: [draft]If the second attack that the Psyker uses in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, it works as if the Psyker had +2 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [draft]If the second attack that the Psyker uses in the turn is a psychic power, it works as if the Psyker had +2 psy rating.
